description.en: A paradise for pioneering musicians Online Woodstock, Utopia for music creators. Music is the most unrestrained way to propagate inspiration. We are committed to creating a self-sustaining and liberated ecosystem for pioneer music. Our DAO governance makes sure every creator is treated fairly and their music inspiration can grow.
